posts.content:
Hello,
Upon sanding back my '64 bug I found these rather sloppy looking welds either side of the bottom edge of my windscreen. I wondered if you can buy repair sections for these without cutting into a bug? And if I did find a bug, how different are these sections from one year to the next? From the picture tells the story half way through I took this section back. As I sanded back towards either bottom corner and a little bit upwards, this was also welded.


Also, I am looking for both A posts and wondered where I could pick some good quality ones up. I am in the UK so would prefer them to come from here but its not essential. Am ordering a couple of bits from Wolfsberg West anyway so they could come from here although I can't find them. If they come in different sizes, I would prefer as tall as possible, if they fit my bug.

Any help would be appreciated,
Thanks,
John

http://i69.photobucket.com/albums/i53/j ... 091196.jpg
Might be better asking on VZI or Pre67 forums John. Had a quick search and found out there is a modified bumper mount for the inner wings you have. Try Coolair.

have seen those cheers steve. going to ring them about the a posts today so if theyve got those two will get it ordered. had a bit of an accident with the rear valance after you left last night. i thought id leave it out til after dinner but rushed out about 5 minutes later when it started raining, forgot to check the garage floor and pushed the bug over it. oh dear.

, forgot to check the garage floor and pushed the bug over it. oh dear.[/quote]







Sam

now now!!

a friend has recommended veng door pillar repairs but i cant find them anywhere-searched on google and looked on a fair few sites, also ebay. anyone know where to get some?

Jon, top picture, no.29?
